plot: On the night before his ordination into the priesthood, Robert, a young seminarian struggling with feelings of uncertainty, sets out to explore his desire for a beautiful Jazz singer who pushes the limits of his curiosity.
title: Ordained
plot_es: On the night before his ordination into the priesthood, Robert, a young seminarian struggling with feelings of uncertainty, sets out to explore his desire for a beautiful Jazz singer who pushes the limits of his curiosity.

produce.name: University of Southern California, School of Cinematic Arts
